General.Name: Public Joint stock company Rosseti Lenenergo
General.Description: Public Joint stock company Rosseti Lenenergo engages in the transmission and distribution of electricity in the Russian Federation. It offers grid connection services, as well as construction, installation, maintenance, and repair services. The company was founded in 1886 and is based in Saint Petersburg, Russia.
General.Address: ul. Gakkelevskaya, 21, lit. A, Saint Petersburg, Russia, 197227
